src:
Elon Musk Mendadak Istirahat Main Twitter, Kenapa?
03 Nov 2019, 05:58 by Agus Tri Haryanto - detikInet


Foto: Screenshoot

Jakarta - Miliuner teknologi Elon Musk mengumumkan dia akan 'offline' dari Twitter. CEO SpaceX dan Tesla ini akan berhenti memposting tweet di Twitter untuk jangka waktu yang belum ditentukan. Pengumuman ini disampaikan Elon pada Jumat (1/11) melalui sebuah cuitan yang ditujukan langsung kepada 29 juta follower di media sosial berlogo burung tersebut. Satu jam sebelum berpamitan, dia sempat memposting tweet terpisah yang mengatakan bahwa dirinya tidak yakin apakah Twitter baik atau tidak. Lalu, dia menambahkan forum Reddit masih bagus, mengacu pada situs grup diskusi populer. Tidak diketahui alasan pasti Elon memutuskan untuk istirahat bermain Twitter. Tidak pula diketahui, apakah keputusan ini selamanya atau hanya sementara. Namun yang jelas, Elon tidak sampai menghapus akun Twitter-nya.


Foto: Screenshoot

Terkait dengan Twitter, Elon beberapa kali mengalami 'hubungan' pasang surut dengan media sosial berlogo burung biru ini. Pendiri The Boring Company ini memang suka aneh-aneh di jejaring sosial yang dinahkodai Jack Dorsey ini. Pada 2018, Elon harus membayar denda USD20 juta gara-gara cuitannya di Twitter yang dianggap tak profesional. Saat itu Elon mencuit dirinya mempertimbangkan untuk menjadikan Tesla sebagai perusahaan pribadi jika harga sahamnya USD 420. Padahal, pihak pabrikan dan para pemegang saham lain belum sekali pun mendiskusikan hal tersebut.Selanjutnya April 2019, Elon harus menghadapi persidangan di pengadilan federal Manhattan, New York, terkait tweet-nya yang kembali dipermasalahkan oleh lembaga Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC). Pada 19 Februari, Elon menulis bahwa Tesla membuat nol mobil di 2011, tapi akan membuat sekitar 500 ribu unit di 2018. Tweet itu kemudian dikoreksi menjadi 400 ribu unit.Tweet itu dipermasalahkan SEC karena ia sudah diperintahkan pengadilan agar berkonsultasi dulu dengan pengacara sebelum memposting tweet soal Tesla. Persidangan ini adalah kelanjutan dari sanksi yang dijatuhkan terkait tweet kontroversial bahwa Tesla akan jadi perusahaan privat Kemudian Juni 2019, netizen sempat mendapati pria yang kerap dijuluki Iron Man di dunia nyata ini menghapus akun Twitter-nya. Entah bagaimana prosesnya, setelah sempat menimbulkan kehebohan, Elon terlihat kembali aktif nge-tweet setelah itu. Nah, apakah pamitnya Elon dari Twitter kali ini sungguhan terjadi atau sekadar mencari sensasi? Simak Video "Nadiem Jadi Mendikbud, Netizen: Pelajaran Sesuai Aplikasi"[Gambas:Video 20detik](agt/afr)
text:
Elon Musk Breaks Suddenly Playing Twitter, Why?
03 Nov 2019, 05:58 by Agus Tri Haryanto - detikInet


Photo: Screenshot

Jakarta - Technology billionaire Elon Musk announced he will be 'offline' from Twitter. CEO of SpaceX and Tesla will stop posting tweets on Twitter for an undetermined period of time. This announcement was delivered by Elon on Friday (1/11) through a tweet addressed directly to 29 million followers on social media bearing the bird logo. An hour before saying goodbye, he had posted a separate tweet saying that he was not sure whether Twitter was good or not. Then, he added the Reddit forum was still good, referring to the popular discussion group site. There is no known reason why Elon decided to break playing Twitter. It is also unknown whether this decision is forever or only temporary. But what is clear, Elon not to delete his Twitter account.


Photo: Screenshot

Regarding Twitter, Elon has experienced several ups and downs with the blue bird logo social media. The founder of The Boring Company does indeed like freaks in this social network that was led by Jack Dorsey. In 2018, Elon must pay a fine of USD20 million because of his tweet on Twitter which is considered unprofessional. At that time Elon tweeted he was considering making Tesla a private company if the stock price was USD 420. In fact, the manufacturer and other shareholders had not even once discussed the matter. Following April 2019, Elon had to face trial in federal court in Manhattan, New York, related to his tweet which was again questioned by the Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC). On February 19, Elon wrote that Tesla made zero cars in 2011, but would make around 500 thousand units in 2018. The tweet was later corrected to 400 thousand units. The tweet was questioned by the SEC because he had been ordered by the court to consult a lawyer before posting a tweet. Tesla problem. This trial is a continuation of the sanctions imposed related to the controversial tweet that Tesla will become a private company. Then in June 2019, netizens had time to find a man who is often nicknamed Iron Man in the real world to delete his Twitter account. Somehow the process, after a time of causing excitement, Elon was seen actively tweeting after that. Well, is Elon saying goodbye from Twitter this time really happening or just looking for sensation? Check out the video "Nadiem Becomes Minister of Education and Culture, Netizens: Lessons According to Applications" [Gambas: Video 20 seconds] (Aug / Afr)
